South Korea to provide $3 mln aid to Japan for quake reliefSouth Korea will provide $3 million worth of humanitarian aid to Japan for Noto peninsula earthquake relief, its foreign ministry said on Thursday. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 01:14:52 GMT QXVSSN3IUZMDRPVUXIDNT3VGEQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-provides-3-mln-aid-japan-quake-relief-2024-01-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
Malaysia anti-graft agency questions ex-PM Ismail in $150 mln publicity spending probeMalaysia's anti-graft investigators have questioned former prime minister Ismail Sabri Yaakob as part of a probe into possible misconduct involving some 700 million ringgit ($150.86 million) spent on government publicity during a previous administration. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 01:11:44 GMT OFRKFCNSQFNEW7AREKH4UIOJEIQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/malaysian-anti-graft-agency-questions-ex-pm-ismail-150-mln-publicity-spending-2024-01-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
China warns Taiwan ruling party presidential candidate over possible confrontationChina's Taiwan Affairs Office said in a statement on Thursday it hopes the majority of Taiwanese recognise the 'extreme danger' of Taiwan's ruling party presidential candidate Lai Ching-te in possibly triggering a cross-strait confrontation. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 00:57:00 GMT SLD6WAVHUJNR5BPIYTAVJTTRAQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-warns-taiwan-ruling-party-presidential-candidate-over-possible-2024-01-11/Reuters世界中国
China warns its citizens in Papua New Guinea to step up precautions amid violenceThe Chinese embassy in Papua New Guinea issued a notice on Thursday reminding Chinese citizens and organizations in the country to strengthen security precautions as a wave of riots, vandalism and looting hits the capital. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 00:48:00 GMT北 CILUNJEDN4NH7NCWZGQIM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-warns-its-citizens-papua-new-guinea-step-up-precautions-amid-violence-2024-01-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
Yemen's Houthis say UN resolution on navigation on the Red Sea is 'political game'The head of Yemen's Houthi supreme revolutionary committee, Mohammed Ali al-Houthi, said on Thursday the UN resolution on navigation on the Red Sea is a "political game" and that the United States was the one violating international law. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 00:43:59 GMT DQUOXGFU4BP6NKNG3G4TBDCGN4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemen-houthis-say-un-resolution-navigation-red-sea-is-political-game-2024-01-11/Reuters世界中东地区
Israel to face Gaza genocide charges at World CourtIsrael prepared to defend itself on Thursday at the top U.N. court against accusations of genocide in Gaza, as Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu publicly rebuffed for the first time calls by some right-wing ministers to permanently occupy the enclave. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 00:29:45 GMT 6P7RGFRFRJNGPIWTBCLSGONPA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-faces-gaza-genocide-charges-world-court-2024-01-11/Mohammed Salem, Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Anthony Deutsch世界中东地区
The female marines Japan is training for warHikari Maruyama, Runa Kurosawa and Sawaka Nakano are part of an elite force: Japan's Amphibious Rapid Deployment Brigade (ARDB), meant to lead assaults from the sea in a possible future war. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 00:19:41 GMT FROOBAGWNJPB3LZE6S5XT5LN2I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/female-marines-japan-is-training-war-2024-01-11/Tim Kelly世界亚太地区
US urges China to not interfere in Taiwan electionsThe United States, in a clear signal to China, opposes any outside interference or influence in Taiwan's upcoming presidential and parliamentary elections, a senior Biden administration official said on Wednesday. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 00:03:40 GMT VX3K5YRRXBNIRBVK65ABGAD6X4 https://www.reuters.com/world/top-biden-aide-meets-senior-chinese-official-discusses-taiwan-2024-01-11/Trevor Hunnicutt, Michael Martina世界
Australia monitoring situation in Papua New Guinea after day of looting, arsonAustralian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese called for calm in neighbouring Papua New Guinea on Thursday, a day after widespread looting and arson left buildings in capital Port Moresby aflame amid reports of several deaths. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 23:50:00 GMT 2HFFD4DFKBPVTCEFXZRSBB6K5M https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-monitoring-situation-papua-new-guinea-after-day-looting-arson-2024-01-10/Lewis Jackson世界亚太地区
UN Security Council demands Houthis stop Red Sea attacksThe U.N. Security Council on Wednesday demanded Yemen's Houthis immediately end attacks on ships in the Red Sea and cautioned against escalating tensions while implicitly endorsing a U.S.-led task force that has been defending vessels. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 23:13:12 GMT WPRSEGF5NRLUPCFWWMRC5UNUEU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-security-council-demands-houthis-stop-red-sea-attacks-2024-01-10/Jonathan Landay, Arshad Mohammed世界中东地区
Ecuador TV station hostage recounts 'surreal' armed takeoverA Ecuadorean journalist who was held hostage by gunmen during the takeover of a Guayaquil TV station and obliged to appear on camera at gunpoint told Reuters on Wednesday the experience was "surreal." Wed, 10 Jan 2024 22:36:39 GMT NG7TCFQDJJNUZOWEP6SC67LKA4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/ecuador-tv-station-hostage-recounts-surreal-armed-takeover-2024-01-10/Yury Garcia, Herbert Villarraga世界美洲
